mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_ORDER(STOREORDER_NUM, STORE_NUM, FOOD_NUM, STOREORDER_QTY, STOREORDER_DATE, STOREORDER_PRICE) VALUES(#{storeOrderNum}, #{storeNum}, #{foodNum}, #{storeOrderQty}, sysdate, (SELECT (SELECT FOOD_PRICE FROM FOOD where FOOD_NUM = #{foodNum}) * #{storeOrderQty} FROM DUAL))
mapper.select: select storeorder_num, store_num, storeorder_date, sum(storeorder_price) AS listPrice from store_order where store_num = #{storeNum} group by storeorder_num, store_num, storeorder_date order by storeorder_num
